title: Merge Zz'Rot and Ohmwrecker + New Actives
body:
Hi guys! Would be awesome if there was one super utility item for seiges. It could have different functions for where you click.

Terrain: Zz'rot Portal Emerge
Enemy Tower: Ohmwrecker Passive
Ally: There next auto does 500 true damage to tower or inhib.
Ally Tower: Makes tower invulnerable for 2.5s.
Enemy in Ally Tower Range: Draws tower agro and a machine gun of 3 bullets fires from tower.

This would be a great seige item for utility supports. One of my main hates as a support is not being able to take down towers or defend towers.

replies.body: its good how it is. ohm wreckers a specialty unit for premade games you wont see the calibre of publically demonstrated and zzrot is just great as is all round. if it aint broke dont fix it ull just break it and thats ur chance
